cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: FileNameMD
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Two different file name templates are used 1) effectiveDateTime_businessProcess_sourcingActor_modelPart_fileVersion 2) effectiveDateTime__sourcingActor_modelPart_fileVersion The templates have fields separated by four underscores (_). Depending of the model part (see rule ModelPartType) the templates are - EQ may use both template 1 and 2 - SHH, TP and SV may only use template 1 - EQBD and TPBD may only use template 2 The field sourcingActor has sub fields separated by dashes (-) and the square brackets [] indicates optional field. Three templates are allowed 3) sourcingTSO[-region] 4) sourcingRSC-cgmRegion 5) sourcingRSC-cgmRegion-sourcingTSO[-region] Depending of the source the templates to use are - A TSO sourcing a file shall always use template 3 - An RSC sourcing a file shall use template 4 for a synchronous area file, e.g. a SV file template 5 for an updated TSO area file, e.g. a SSH file
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Number of meta data fields in file name does not match the rules

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: FileNameConsistency
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Each cimxml file is contained by a single zip container, except for the boundary data. The file name of the cimxml file within the container must be the same as the name of the container.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: XML instance file name is different from zip container file name

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: EffectiveDateTime
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'effectiveDateTime' in the file name must be valid datetime in minute resolution in accordance with ISO 8601-2005 , basic format with time designator [T] between date and time and ending with UTC designator [Z]. The characters [:-+YMDHSWP] are not allowed, see example below - 20180118T1130Z The restriction describes the minimum required specification that a receiver shall be prepared to consume. A more precisely specified time will be ignored.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The relevant time resolution for the business process is minute level and the time in the file name shall match with this attribute.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: EffectiveDateTime is invalid

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ModelingAuthority
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'modelingAuthority' (MA) in the file name is restricted according to the agreed list in a configuration file. The text is not case sensitive.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Modeling Authority not recognized

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SourcingActor
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The sourcingActor, that appears in the cimxml file name, is composed from the TSO name and the optional region name as described in rule FileNameMD. The TSO name and the optional region name are chosen by the TSO responsible for the region and the chosen names are recorded in the CgmProcessConfigurationData document. Once decided the sourcingActor should comply with the chosen names in the CgmProcessConfigurationData document.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The sourcingActor shall comply with the choices made by a TSO.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Undefined TSO or network region names specified

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CGMRegion
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: TSO networks are organized in synchronous areas including multiple TSO network regions. Each synchronous area is assigned unique identifiers in file names. The allowed synchronous areas are listed in the CgmProcessConfigurationData document.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Needed to uniquely identify synchronous areas for SV of CGM.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Unidentified synchronous area specified in SV instance filename of CGM

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: BusinessProcess
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'businessProcess' in the file name is restricted according to a list in the CgmBpMasterData document. See also level 2 rule ModelDescription where the BusinessProcess is required in the Model.description attribute.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Unknown business process

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ModelPartType
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'modelPart' in the file name is restricted. Note that the profile declarations in the file header are leading and shall be used as meta data to request data.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Unknown modelPart Type

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: FileVersionType
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'fileVersion' in the file name must be an integer value always represented by three numeric characters ranging from 000 to 999. Leading zeros are allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See this specification section 3.1 and IEC TS 61970-600-1 C.3.1.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: File version must be a number with three numeric character positions.

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: Prolog
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The CIMXML file must have a prolog containing attributes version and encoding.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See this specification, section 4.1.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Prolog is missing

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: Encoding
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If the encoding is different from UTF-8, it shall be considered an error Note: the encoding is case insensitive
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Missing encoding or encoding other than UTF-8

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: XMLStructure
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If the XML parsing fails, the process is aborted
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#dt-fatal
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: XML parsing error

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: FileHeader
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Each type of instance file shall have exactly one file header of type FullModel or DifferenceModel
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Requirement HGEN2 of IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017, IEC 61970-552, section 5.2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Missing file header

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: URNUniqueness
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: A new model ID shall be generated for new instance files, only when the content of the instance data changes. A new version means a new URN.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Requirement HREF1, HREF5 of IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: URN of the instance file already exists

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MAS
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.modelingAuthoritySet' attribute must be specified in the file header and must be a valid URL. The value shall be aligned with the modelingAuthority in the file name specified in rule ModelingAuthority extended with the region specifier and the usage, following the pattern "http://{modeling authority}/{usage}/{region}" The allowed values for 'md:Model.modelingAuthoritySet' are listed in the CgmBpMasterData document.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Requirement HGEN1, HGEN5 of IEC/TS 61970-600-1:2017. The attribute is mandatory for the CGM process.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid Modeling Authority Set specification

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MASPersistency
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.modelingAuthoritySet' attribute must be persistent for all exchanges within the operational planning process. The allowed values are listed in rule MAS.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See QoCDCv3.1 section 3.1.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Modeling Authority Set specification must be persistent

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ModelCreated
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The date and time when the model was created. It is the time of the serialization. The format is an extended format according to the ISO 8601-2005. The ENTSO-E exchanges should refer to UTC. The 'md:Model.created' attribute must be valid datetime in accordance with ISO 8601, extended format with time designator [T] between date and time ending with UTC designator [Z]. The characters [:-] shall be used and the characters [.+YMDHSWP] are not allowed see example below - 2018-01-18T11:30:12Z.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Annex C of IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid Model.created attribute

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ScenarioTime
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.scenarioTime' attribute must be valid datetime in accordance with ISO 8601, extended format with time designator [T] between date and time ending with UTC designator [Z]. The characters [:-] shall be used and the characters [.+YMDHSWP] are not allowed see example below - 2018-01-18T11:30:12Z.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Annex C of IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid Model.scenarioTime attribute

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ScenarioTimeConsistency
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.scenarioTime' attribute shall refer to the same datetime as the 'effectiveDateTime' in the file name, considering minute resolution.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Necessary to produce consistent meta data for the exchange process
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The scenarioTime specification in the file header does not match the effectiveDateTime specified in the file name

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: VersionConsistency
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.version' attribute shall be the same number as the 'fileVersion' string from the file name converted to an integer.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Necessary to produce consistent meta data for the exchange process.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The model version does not match the file version

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ProfileSpecification
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.profile' description in the file header is restricted. Note: The profile declarations in the file header are leading and shall be used as meta data to request data. The enumeration values are centrally maintained in CgmProcessConfigurationData document.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Necessary to determine which RDFS rules to use. Requirement FBOD2, HGEN1 of IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017. Annex C of IEC/TS 61970-600-1:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid profile specification

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ModelDescription
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The 'md:Model.description' attribute must be specified in the file header and contains data embedded in an xml structure as described by the qodc:MDE element below. The text embedded in the qodc:MDE subelements describe how to fill in the data.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See this specification, section 3.1.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Missing md:Model.description

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NotMandatoryClass
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: An instance of a class not described in a CGMES profile is ignored and reported. If an importing tool requires a class not described in a CGMES profile issues may occur for a CGM where other IGMs do not contain instances of the class.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Requirement PROF11 of IEC/TS 61970-600-1:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Class instance in cimxml document is ignored

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NotMandatoryProperty
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: A role or attribute not described in a CGMES profile is ignored and reported. If an importing tool require a role or attribute not described in a CGMES profile issues may occur for a CGM where other IGMs do not contain instances of the role or attribute.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Requirement PROF11 of IEC/TS 61970-600-1:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Role or attribute in cimxml document is ignored

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: AttributeAndRoleValues
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Attribute and role values appearing in a CIMXML document shall have a value. Empty elements or attributes are not allowed, see examples below: - [cim:class.attribute/] - [cim:class.attribute rdf:resouce=""/] The above example results in no value, i.e. a null value. Empty strings are allowed, see examples below: - [cim:class.attribute][/cim:class.attribute] The above example results in a string with no characters, i.e. an empty string. Name related attributes of the IdentifiedObject that are required can be exchanged as empty string i.e. [IdentifiedObject.name][/IdentifiedObject.name] Note: the xml angle brackets has been replaced by square parenthesis in above examples.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Only meaningful data shall be exchanged in CIMXML documents. See also IEC TS 61970-600-1 NAMC14.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Empty element or attribute value present

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ValidResourceValue
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If '#_' or 'urn:uuid:' do not prefix the value of rdf:resource, the reference is invalid. The 'urn:uuid:' form is used in the md:Model.Supersedes and md:Model.DependentOn references.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See IEC 61970-552
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid reference

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ValidAboutValue
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If '#_' or 'urn:uuid:' do not prefix the value of rdf:about, the mRID is invalid. The 'urn:uuid:' form is used in the object definition attribute md:FullModel rdf:about.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See IEC 61970-552
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid mRID rdf:about

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ValidIDValue
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If '_' do not prefix the value of rdf:ID, the mRID is invalid.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See IEC 61970-552
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid mRID

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: DecimalComma
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Decimal comma is not allowed in floating point numbers. Shall be decimal point.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: IEEE 754. Note: A locale settings may select either comma or full stop and a particular locale settings do not support both comma and full stop. Due to this a mix of comma and full stop prevent interoperability, hence one must be selected.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Decimal comma is not allowed in floating point numbers

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NotaNumber
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If data is missing for a CIM/CGMES attribute, or if 'NaN', 'INF' or '-nan(ind)' etc. is used when a numeric value is expected, the model is considered erroneous. If a code is allowed for a numeric value this shall be specifically stated for that attribute.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Not a Number values cannot be processed correctly
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: No valid value provided

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NameLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: cim:IdentifiedObject.name shall exist and not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters for all instances except for instances of subclasses of cim:ACDCTerminal where cim:IdentifiedObject.name may be omitted.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name instance is missing or exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: DescriptionLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every model instance, the length of all instances of cim:IdentifiedObject.description shall not exceed IO_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of description instance exceeds IO_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: EICLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:IdentifiedObject.energyIdentCodeEic must be exactly EIC_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of energyIdentCodeEic instance must be exactly EIC_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ShortNameLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:IdentifiedObject.shortName shall not exceed SHORT_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of shortName instance exceeds SHORT_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNFromEndIsoCode
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In an EQBD document attribute value entsoe:ConnectivityNode.fromEndIsoCode must be from the country code list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Country code is not in the list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TNFromEndIsoCode
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In a TPBD document attribute value entsoe:TopologicalNode.fromEndIsoCode must be from the country code list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Country code is not in the list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNToEndIsoCode
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In an EQBD document attribute value entsoe:ConnectivityNode.toEndIsoCode must be from the country code list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Country code not from list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TNToEndIsoCode
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In a TPBD document attribute value entsoe:TopologicalNode.toEndIsoCode must be from the country code list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Country code is not in the list https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNFromEndNameLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every EQBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:ConnectivityNode.fromEndName shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TNFromEndNameLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every TPBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:TopologicalNode.fromEndName shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNToEndNameLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every EQBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:ConnectivityNode.toEndName shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TNToEndNameLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every TPBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:TopologicalNode.toEndName shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNFromEndNameTsoLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every EQBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:ConnectivityNode.fromEndNameTso shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TNFromEndNameTsoLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every TPBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:TopologicalNode.fromEndNameTso shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNToEndNameTsoLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every EQBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:ConnectivityNode.toEndNameTso shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TNToEndNameTsoLength
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: In every TPBD model instance, the length of all instances of entsoe:TopologicalNode.toEndNameTso shall not exceed IO_NAME_LENGTH characters.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Length of name attribute exceeds IO_NAME_LENGTH characters

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ShuntCompensatorSensitivity
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The following attribute value shall be greater than zero - cim:ShuntCompensator.voltageSensitivity
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Decision from 2018-11-09 CGM_BP/EMF meeting. It was concluded that a negative value is not physically possible.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: VoltageSensitivity attribute value shall be greater than zero

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NumberOfSubstations
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The following number of cim:Substations in an IGM are considered suspicious - a single cim:Substation which is the min limit. - one cim:Substation per cim:VoltageLevel which is the max limit. The upper limit for the number of cim:Substations equals the number of cim:VoltageLevels.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The number of cim:Substations should reflect the design of the power system.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The number of cim:Substations does not reflect the design of the power system

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: GenerationContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:HydroPump and cim:GeneratingUnit (and subclasses thereof), the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:Substation. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 15 (Core notes) of IEC TS 61970-600-2 section 6.7.11.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:HydroPump and cim:GeneratingUnit must be contained in a cim:Substation

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PTContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:PowerTransformer, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:Substation or of type cim:DCConverterUnit. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 15 (Core notes) and Figure 5 (diagram DCContainment) of IEC TS 61970-600-2 sections 6.7.11 and 6.3.9.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A cim:PowerTransformer must be contained in a cim:Substation or a cim:DCConverterUnit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SwitchContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:Switch (and subclasses thereof), the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type VoltageLevel, of type Bay or of type DCConverterUnit. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 15 (Core notes) and Figure 5 (diagram DCContainment) of IEC TS 61970-600-2 sections 6.7.11 and 6.3.9.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Switches must be contained in a VoltageLevel, a Bay or a DCConverterUnit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SCContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:SeriesCompensator, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, if provided, must be of type cim:Line, of type cim:VoltageLevel or of type cim:DCConverterUnit.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 15 (diagram Core notes) in section 6.7.1 of IEC TS 61970-600-2, Figure 5 (diagram DCContainment) in section 6.3.1 of IEC TS 61970-600-2 and section 6.9.16 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A cim:SeriesCompensator can only be contained in a cim:Line, a cim:VoltageLevel or a cim:DCConverterUnit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: InjectionContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:EnergyConsumer subclasses, cim:RotatingMachine subclasses, cim:ShuntCompensator subclasses, cim:EnergySource, cim:EquivalentShunt, cim:ExternalNetworkInjection and cim:StaticVarCompensator, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:VoltageLevel. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Injections must be contained in a cim:VoltageLevel

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: BusbarSectionContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:BusbarSection, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:VoltageLevel. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 15 (diagram Core notes) of IEC TS 61970-600-2 section 6.10.5.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A cim:BusbarSection must be contained in a cim:VoltageLevel

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: EFCContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:EarthFaultCompensator and subclasses and cim:Ground, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:VoltageLevel. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 15 (diagram Core notes) of IEC TS 61970-600-2 section 6.7.6.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: An cim:EarthFaultCompensator must be contained in a cim:VoltageLevel

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: JunctionContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:Junction (Equipment Boundary file), the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:Line. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 4.4.5 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A cim:Junction must be contained in a cim:Line

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ACDCConvContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:CsConverter and cim:VsConverter, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:DCConverterUnit. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.3.2 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A cim:ACDCConverter must be contained in a cim:DCConverterUnit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: DCEQContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:DCSeriesDevice, cim:DCShunt, cim:DCBusbar, cim:DCGround, cim:DCChopper, cim:DCSwitch, cim:DCBreaker and cim:DCDisconnector, the cim:Equipment.EquipmentContainer referred to, must be of type cim:DCConverterUnit. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.3.2 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: All DC equipment, except cim:DCLineSegment must be contained in a DCConverterUnit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNContainment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For cim:ConnectivityNodes according to EQ, the cim:ConnectivityNode.ConnectivityNodeContainer referred to, must be of type cim:VoltageLevel, cim:Bay or cim:Line. For cim:ConnectivityNodes according to EQBD, the cim:ConnectivityNode.ConnectivityNodeContainer referred to, must be of type cim:Line. Missing containment is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See Figure 1 (diagram EquipmentBoundaryProfile), figure 15 (diagram Core Notes), section 6.7.7 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:ConnectivityNode must be contained in a cim:VoltageLevel, cim:Bay or cim:Line for EQ models and in a cim:Line for Boundary points

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNTerminals
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: cim:ConnectivityNodes that: - are isolated and do not have any Terminals connecting to equipment. - have one Terminal that connect to a dead equipment end.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Isolated or dead end cim:ConnectivityNodes may indicate a connectivity issue.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Isolated or dead end ConnectivityNodes may indicate a connectivity issue

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: GeneratingUnitNominalP
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: According to CGMES the value of cim:GeneratingUnit.nominalP should be positive and less or equal to cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.6.5 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:GeneratingUnit.nominalP outside allowed range

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CEBaseVoltage
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: All cim:ConductingEquipment except cim:ACLineSegment, cim:EquivalentBranch and cim:PowerTransformer must either have an association with cim:BaseVoltage or be located within a cim:VoltageLevel or cim:Bay. If both are set the cim:VoltageLevel's cim:BaseVoltage must equal that of the cim:ConductingEquipment. cim:ConductingEquipment at a boundary may not have a cim:BaseVoltage assigned before merge with the boundary, hence they are checked in rule BranchBaseVoltage at level 5.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.7.6 and 6.10.2 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A cim:ConductingEquipment must link to a cim:BaseVoltage via a cim:VoltageLevel or cim:Bay or direct link to cim:BaseVoltage

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NominalVoltage
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:BaseVoltage, the cim:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage value must be greater than zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.7.3 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Nominal voltage must be greater than zero

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: InstancesOfGeneralClass
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The most specific and detailed class shall in general be instantiated. Hence more general classes shall not be instantiated. The following classes are specifically noted as not allowed to instantiate - cim:EnergyConsumer
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The level of detail described by the more specific class are needed in studies. The approved methodologies: CGMM-v1-plus.Article 9, Load, 4(c) (as well CGMM-v2-plus.and CGMM-v3 referencing to CGMM-v1-plus) and GLDPM-v1 : Article 2, Definitions and interpretation, point 3 and 7, Article 11, 4(9) (as well GLDPM-v2.referencing to GLDPM-v1) foresee the provision of conforming and non-conforming load flag as well as approved EMF Requirements.which implies the use specific classes of EnergyConsumer. IEC 61970-600-1:2017.Common Grid Model Exchange Specification.pdf, 5.1 General constraints, GENC11: Instance data to be exchanged must make use of the most detailed class possible within a profile, i.e. using sub-typed classes rather than general classes e.g. NuclearGeneratingUnit instead GeneratingUnit. specify it as mandatory for application. Note that this rule is not applied for GeneratingUnit.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Instances of type cim:EnergyConsumer is not an allowed, the use of its subclasses is mandatory

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TerminalCount1
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:RegulatingCondEq and its subclasses, cim:EnergyConsumer and its subclasses, cim:EquivalentInjection, cim:EquivalentShunt, subclasses of cim:Connector and cim:EarthFaultCompensator, cim:EnergySource, cim:Ground, cim:DCBusbar, cim:DCShunt, cim:DCGround and subclasses of cim:DCConverterUnit shall only be referenced via a single cim:Terminal instance.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: cim:ConductingEqupment with a single electrical connection point shall only have one cim:Terminal
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Single terminal devices must not be referenced by multiple terminals

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TerminalCount2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:Conductor and its subclasses, cim:Switch and its subclasses, cim:ACLineSegment, cim:SeriesCompensator, cim:EquivalentBranch, cim:DCLineSegment, cim:DCSeriesDevice, cim:DCSwitch and cim:DCChopper, shall only be referenced via exactly two Terminal instances
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: cim:ConductingEqupment with two electrical connection point shall have two cim:Terminals
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Two terminal devices must be referenced by exactly two terminals

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TerminalSeqNum
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:Terminal must have a cim:Terminal.sequenceNumber if it belongs to an cim:EquivalentBranch or an cim:ACLineSegment with cim:MutualCoupling
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.7.21 and 6.10.31 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:Terminals must have a sequence number if they belong to an cim:EquivalentBranch or a cim:ACLineSegment with cim:MutualCoupling

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TerminalSeqNumOrder
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ConductingEquipment and cim:DCConductingEquipment of which its terminal(s) have a cim:Terminal.sequenceNumber, at least one sequenceNumber must be equal to 1 and any following sequenceNumber shall be increased by one.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.7.2 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid sequenceNumber for cim:Terminal

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PTTerminalConsistency
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:PowerTransformerEnd, the cim:Terminal referenced by the cim:TransformerEnd.Terminal association must be associated with the cim:PowerTransformer instance, referenced via the cim:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer association.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.9.31 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Terminals for PowerTransformers must be defined unambiguously

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MCFirst
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:MutualCoupling.First_Terminal must belong to an cim:ACLineSegment.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.9.19 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:MutualCoupling.First_Terminal must link to a cim:ACLineSegment cim:Terminal

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MCSecond
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:MutualCoupling.Second_Terminal must belong to an cim:ACLineSegment.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.9.19 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:MutualCoupling.Second_Terminal must link to a cim:ACLineSegment cim:Terminal

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: LRCExponentModel
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic with cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.exponentModel is true, cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pVoltageExponent and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qVoltageExponent must be provided and be greater than zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.10.9 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Exponent of per unit voltage effecting real and reactive power must be specified if cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.exponentModel is true

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: LCRCoefficientModel
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic with cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.exponentModel is false, cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantImpedance and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantCurrent and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantPower and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantImpedance and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantCurrent and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantPower must be provided.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.10.9 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Coefficients for ZIP load model must be specified

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: LCRCoefficientParameters
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic with cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.exponentModel is false, the sum of cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantImpedance and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantCurrent and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantPower values must be 1 and the sum of cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantImpedance and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantCurrent and cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantPower values must be 1.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.10.9 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid coefficient parameters for cim:LoadResponseCharacteristic

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MeasTerminal
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:Measurement, the cim:Terminal reference by cim:Measurement.Terminal must belong to the same cim:PowerSystemResource as referenced in cim:Measurement.PowerSystemResource.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.5.18 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The measurement terminal must belong to the same PSR the measurement belongs to

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MeasType
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:Measurement, the value of cim:Measurement.measurementType is limited to 'ThreePhasePower', 'ThreePhaseActivePower', 'ThreePhaseReactivePower', 'LineCurrent', 'PhaseVoltage', 'LineToLineVoltage', 'Angle', 'TapPosition', 'SwitchPosition'.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.5.18 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid measurement type

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: MeasUnit
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:Measurement, the value of cim:Measurement.unitSymbol is restricted to 'cim:UnitSymbol.V', 'cim:UnitSymbol.A', 'cim:UnitSymbol.W', 'cim:UnitSymbol.VA', 'cim:UnitSymbol.VAr', 'cim:UnitSymbol.deg', 'cim:UnitSymbol.Hz', 'cim:UnitSymbol.none'
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.5.18 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid measurement unit symbol

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CATieFlow
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ControlArea for which the value of cim:ControlArea.type is cim:ControlAreaTypeKind.Interchange, cim:TieFlow instances must be provided.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: This is necessary to compute interchange.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:TieFlows must be defined for cim:ControlArea, no cim:TieFlows found

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TargetDB
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:RegulatingControl (SSH) for which the value of cim:RegulatingControl.discrete is true and cim:RegulatingControl.enabled is true, cim:RegulatingControl.targetDeadband must be provided and must be > 0
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: If cim:RegulatingControl.discrete is set to true and no deadband is provided the power flow algorithm may not reach a solution but may continue to try find one which results in hunting.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Target deadband must be provided if the regulating control is discrete and active

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: OperationalLimitValue
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:VoltageLimit, the value of cim:VoltageLimit.value must be > 0. For every instance of cim:CurrentLimit, the value of cim:CurrentLimit.value must be > 0. For every instance of cim:ActivePowerLimit, the value of cim:ActivePowerLimit.value must be > 0. For every instance of cim:ApparentPowerLimit, the value of cim:ApparentPowerLimit.value must be > 0.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.8.5 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: OperationalLimit values must be positive

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: AcceptableDuration
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The use of the attribute acceptable cim:OperationalLimitType.acceptableDuration depends on the value of the entsoe:OperationalLimitType.limitType attribute as follows - patl; acceptableDuration is not used - patlt; acceptableDuration is not used as the limit is less that the patl limit - tatl; acceptableDuration is used as the limit is greater that the patl limit - tc; acceptableDuration is not used as immediate tripping is expected - tct; acceptableDuration is used as the limit is less than the tc limit and describe how long the violation may sustain before tripping. If acceptableDuration duration is not used the attribute can be completely omitted or if included the acceptableDuration value shall be ignored.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.8.9.1 and 6.8.7 of IEC TS 61970-600-2.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: OperationalLimitType.acceptableDuration missing for non PATL limit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: OperationalLimitSetAtTerminal
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: A cim:OperationalLimitSet shall be linked to a cim:Terminal, not the equipment. This rule applies to all equipment regardless of its number of cim:Terminals. Any or all cim:Terminals in case of multiple terminal equipment may be used.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The limits in question are related to power flow, hence they are linked to the cim:Terminal. Less options also simplifies data exchange.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The OperationalLimitSet should not be linked to the Equipment but to a Terminal

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PATL1
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:ACLineSegment and cim:SeriesCompensator, that is not aggregated, shall have at least one cim:OperationalLimitSet linked to one of its cim:Terminals. A cim:OperationalLimitSet shall have at least one cim:OperationalLimit of type entsoe:PATL. Equipment is aggregated when cim:Equipment.aggregate is present and set to 'true'.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.8.7 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: PATL missing for cim:ACLineSegment or cim:SeriesCompensator

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PATL2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Every instance of cim:PowerTransformer, that is not aggregated, shall have a single cim:OperationalLimitSet linked to one of its cim:Terminals and optionaly additional cim:OperationalLimitSets linked to the other cim:Terminals A OperationalLimitSet shall have at least one cim:OperationalLimit of type entsoe:PATL. Equipment is aggregated when cim:Equipment.aggregate is present and set to 'true'.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.8.7 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: PATL missing for cim:PowerTransformer

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PATL3
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: There shall be only one PATL limitType per cim:OperationalLimitSet and type - cim:ActivePowerLimit - cim:CurrentLimit or cim:ApparentPowerLimit This means that an cim:OperationalLimitSet may have two PATL values, one for cim:CurrentLimit or cim:ApparentPowerLimit and one for cim:ActivePowerLimit.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.8.9.1 of IEC TS 61970-600-2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Redundant PATL not allowed for OperationalLimitSet

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PATL4
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For an instance of cim:ACLineSegment or cim:SeriesCompensator the limit values of the same cim:OperationalLimitType.limitType shall not differ more than PATL_LIMIT_VALUE_DIFF between the two sides, e.g. a cim:CurrentLimit of type PATL.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Based on engineering practice.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Differing limit values on two sides of the equipment above PATL_LIMIT_VALUE_DIFF

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PATL5
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: PATL type on voltage limits shall be ignored.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.8.9.1 of IEC TS 61970-600-2:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: PATL voltage limit is ignored

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CNRequiredInEQOperations
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: cim:ConnectivityNodes are required in operational models where the EQ Operation profile is specified in the header. The different kinds of models are described in IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017 PROF4.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: See section 6.7.7 and rules PROF4 and PROF5 of IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Reference to Connectivity node missing in Terminal for operational model

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ReactiveControlAtBus
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: A cim:RegulatingControl or cim:TapchangerControl doing reactive power control (cim:RegulatingControl.mode = reactivePower and powerFactor) require that the controlled cim:Terminal is in a path that can carry power, i.e. a branch or injecting equipment. Hence doing reactive power control on a cim:BusbarSection cim:Terminal is not possible.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: General physics. See IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017 section E.12.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Reactive power cannot be controlled on cim:BusbarSection cim:Terminal

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: EnergySourceVoltage
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For cim:EnergySource the attributes voltageMagnitude and voltageAngle are optional to include in EQ. The attributes are intended for the case when a strong network is providing power to a weak distribution network. Hence it is wrong to use these attributes in transmission studies and they shall not at all be used.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The use case for that attributes not appropriate for transmission. See IEC TS 61970-600-1:2017 section E.19.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The use case for cim:EnergySource attributes voltageMagnitude and voltageAngle is not allowed for transmission

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ControlModeCompatibility
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The cim:TapChangerControl can only do control compatible with its type, - A phase shift tap changer can only do the cim:RegulatingControl.mode - active power control - A ratio tap changer can only do the cim:RegulatingControl.modes - voltage - reactivePower - powerFactor - A cim:SynchronousMachine or cim:ShuntCompensator instance can only do the RegulatingControl.modes - voltage - reactivePower - powerFactor - A cim:StativeVarCompensator can only do the RegulatingControl.modes - voltage - reactivePower The following cim:RegulatingControl.modes are not at all allowed - currentFlow - admittance - timeScheduled - temperature Flow type of controls are not possible at cim:BusbarSection cim:Terminal.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Only meaningful combinations of data are allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:TapChangerControl or cim:RegulatingControl with invalid cim:RegulatingControl.mode

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ACLineSegmentR
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ACLineSegment the value of cim:ACLineSegment.r must be greater than or equal to zero
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Negative resistance means negative losses. This is not allowed for real equipment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Negative resistance not allowed for ACLineSegment

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ACLineSegmentX
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ACLineSegment the value of cim:ACLineSegment.x should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Too small impedances cause numerical instability when solving the power flow.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Reactance value should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT.

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SeriesCompensatorX
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:SeriesCompensator the value of abs(cim:SeriesCompensator.x) should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Too small impedances cause numerical instability when solving the power flow.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Reactance value should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT.

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: EquivalentBranchX
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of EquivalentBranch (EB) the value of absolute value for cim:EquivalentBranch.x and cim:EquivalentBranch.x21 should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm. The absolute value is computed as sqrt(EB.x * EB.x + EB.x21 * EB.x21).
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Too small impedances cause numerical instability when solving the power flow.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Reactance value should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT.

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: DCLineSegmentR
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:DCLineSegment the value of cim:DCLineSegment.resistance and the value of the associated cim:PerLengthDCLineParameter.resistance must be greater than zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Negative resistance means negative losses. This is not allowed for real equipment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Negative resistance not allowed for cim:DCLineSegment

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PowerTransformerEndR
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For cim:PowerTransformerEnds the following rules applies - two-winding transformer the high voltage end cim:PowerTransformerEnd.r shall be modelled at the high voltage side and be greater than EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm. - two-winding transformer shall be modelled at the low voltage side and should be zero (cim:PowerTransformerEnd.r = 0) - three-winding transformer all ends cim:PowerTransformerEnd.r should be greater than EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Negative resistance means negative losses. This is not allowed for real equipment
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: PowerTransformerEnd resistance should be non-negative and greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PowerTransformerEndRatedU
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The cim:PowerTransformerEnd.ratedU attribute must be greater than zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The cim:PowerTransformerEnd.ratedU attribute is used in pu calculations.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:PowerTransformerEnd.ratedU should be greater than zero

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PowerTransformerEndX
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For cim:PowerTransformerEnds the following rules applies - two-winding transformer the high voltage end cim:PowerTransformerEnd.x should have a non-zero value and should be greater than EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm - two-winding transformer the low voltage end cim:PowerTransformerEnd.x = 0 - three-winding transformer all ends abs(cim:PowerTransformerEnd.x) should be greater than EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT Ohm
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Transformers with zero series reactance do not exist. At a two winding transformer the series reactance is specified at the high voltage side and the low voltage side isn't used.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: PowerTransformerEnd reactance should be non-zero value greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT for the two winding transformer high voltage end and zero for the two winding transformer low voltage end. For three winding transformers all ends sould have a non-zero value and should be greater than or equal to EQ_BRANCH_X_LIMIT

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: LinearShuntCompensatorG
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:LinearShuntCompensator the value of cim:LinearShuntCompensator.gPerSection must be greater than or equal to zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The charging conductance represents the losses, which should. be non-negative.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:LinearShuntCompensator.gPerSection must be non-negative

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ShuntCompensatorSections
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ShuntCompensator the value of cim:ShuntCompensator.normalSections must be greater than or equal to zero and less or equal to cim:ShuntCompensator.maximumSections.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The sections specify the shunt compensator sections in use, which should be non-negative.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:ShuntCompensator.normalSections outside allowed range

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ConverterLosses
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:CsConverter and cim:VsConverter, the value of cim:ACDCConverter.idleLoss, cim:ACDCConverter.switchingLoss and cim:ACDCConverter.resistiveLoss, if provided, must be greater than or equal to zero
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Losses cannot be negative
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Negative losses are not allowed for Converter, losses must be greater than or equal to zero

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SVCRatings
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:StaticVarCompensator, the value of cim:StaticVarCompensator.capacitiveRating must be positive. The value of cim:StaticVarCompensator.inductiveRating must be negative. Zero values are not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Capacitive rating should be greater than zero, inductive rating should be lower than zero for SVC

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SVCSlope
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The cim:StaticVarCompensator.slope must be positive or zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The reactive power output of the SVC is proportional to the difference between the voltage at the regulated bus and the voltage setpoint. When the regulated bus voltage is equal to the voltage setpoint, the reactive power output is zero. cim:RequlatingControl is used as it has capabilities missing from SVC, e.g. the controlled point.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:StaticVarCompensator.slope must be positive or zero

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: GeneratingUnitLimits
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:GeneratingUnit, cim:HydroGeneratingUnit, cim:NuclearGeneratingUnit, cim:SolarGeneratingUnit, cim:ThermalGeneratingUnit or cim:WindGeneratingUnit, the value of cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP must be greater than or equal to the value of cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The name plate ratings are used as a reference.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid operating limits for cim:GeneratingUnit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: GeneratingUnitMaxPGen
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:GeneratingUnit, cim:HydroGeneratingUnit, cim:NuclearGeneratingUnit, cim:SolarGeneratingUnit, cim:ThermalGeneratingUnit or cim:WindGeneratingUnit, with cim:SynchronousMachine of type generator the value of cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP must be greater than or equal to zero. Note that the limits follow generation sign convention.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The name plate ratings are used as a reference.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid operating limit, cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP must be greater than or equal to zero

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SynchronousCondenser
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For a synchronous condenser there is no capability for real power output, the cim:SynchronousMachine is not required to be associated with a cim:GeneratingUnit. In this case, the type attribute must be set to condenser.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The name plate ratings are used as a reference. See IEC TS 61970-600-2:2017, section 6.9.47.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: A synchronous condenser shall not have a generating unit

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SMQLimits1
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For a cim:SynchronousMachine, the value of cim:SynchronousMachine.maxQ should be greater than or equal to the value of cim:SynchronousMachine.minQ, if provided. Note that the limits follow generation sign convention.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The name plate ratings are used as a reference
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid operating limits for Synchronous Machine

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SMQLimits2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For a cim:SynchronousMachine, either cim:SynchronousMachine.minQ and cim:SynchronousMachine.maxQ must be provided, or an association to a cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve must exist.. If cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve exists cim:SynchronousMachine.minQ and cim:SynchronousMachine.maxQ shall be ignored.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Missing operating limits for Synchronous Machine

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: RatedS
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS is required, cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS and cim:PowerTransfomerEnd.ratedS shall be greater than zero.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: RatedS is required for data validation. See IEC TS 61970-600-2:2017, section 6.9.41.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Missing or zero ratedS

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SMQLimits3
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:SynchronousMachine with exactly one cim:GeneratingUnit the following rules applies - abs(maxP) Less or Equal ratedS - abs(minP) Less or Equal ratedS - abs(maxQ) Less or Equal ratedS - abs(minQ) Less or Equal ratedS where - maxP is cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP - maxQ is cim:SynchronousMachine.maxQ - minP is cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP - minQ is cim:SynchronousMachine.minQ - ratedS is cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The limit values shall be inside the rated capability.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Inconsistent cim:SynchronousMachine and cim:GeneratingUnit limits

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SMPLimits
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For a cim:SynchronousMachine with a cim:GeneratingUnit the active power limits shall relate to cim:SynchronousMachine.type as follows - condenser, cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP = 0 and cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP = 0. - generator or generatorOrCondenser, cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP lager or equal to 0 and cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP lager than 0. - motor or motorOrCondenser, cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP less than 0 and cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP less or equal to 0. - generatorOrMotor or generatorOrCondenserOrMotor, cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP less than 0 and cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP greater than 0.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The active power limit values depend on the cim:SynchronousMachine.type and this dependence need to be described.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The active power limit values do not match the cim:SynchronousMachine.type

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CurveStyle
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The cim:Curve.curveStyle enumerated value cim:CurveStyle.constantYValue is not allowed.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The cim:CurveStyle.constantYValue gives too inaccurate compared with cim:CurveStyle.straightLineYValues.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The cim:CurveStyle.constantYValue enumeration is not allowed

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: RCCYValues
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:CurveData, for which the cim:CurveData.Curve refers to a cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve, the cim:CurveData.y2value must be greater or equal than cim:CurveData.y1value If cim:CurveData.y2value and cim:CurveData.y1value are equal for all curve points this is considered an error. It is not allowed that all CurveData.y2value values are equal to CurveData.y1value values.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The name plate ratings are used as a reference.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid reactive capability curve data

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CurveXValues
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:CurveData, for which the cim:CurveData.Curve refers to a cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve, the cim:CurveData.xvalue shall be different, e.g. in the case of two cim:CurveData called CD1 and CD2 the following shall give a warning when CD1.xvalue = CD2.xvalue.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: All x values in a reactive capability curve shall differ for the curve to be meaningful.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Some points in the reactive capability curve have the same x value

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: RCCXValues2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For a cim:SynchronousMachine with a cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve the number of cim:CurveData instances depends on the attribute cim:SynchronousMachine.type as follows - condenser, one cim:CurveData instance with cim:CurveData.xvalue = 0. - generator or generatorOrCondenser, at least two cim:CurveData instances with cim:CurveData.xvalue greater or equal 0. - motor or motorOrCondenser, at least two cim:CurveData instances with cim:CurveData.xvalue less or equal 0. - generatorOrMotor or generatorOrCondenserOrMotor, at least three cim:CurveData instances with at least one having cim:CurveData.xvalue greater or equal 0 and and one having cim:CurveData.xvalue less or equal 0.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: A cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve for a Pump Storage unit shall have at least three curve points. A cim:SynchronousMachine operating as either motor or generator shall have at least two curve points. A cim:SynchronousMachine operating as condenser shall have at least one curve point.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid number of curve points in reactive capability curve data

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: RCCXValues3
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve, a cim:CurveData instance must exist with a value of cim:CurveData.xvalue that is greater than or equal to the cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP of the cim:GeneratingUnit associated with the cim:SynchronousMachine to which the curve applies and a cim:CurveData instance must exist with a value of cim:CurveData.xvalue that is lower than or equal to the cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP of the cim:GeneratingUnit associated with the cim:SynchronousMachine to which the curve applies.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: A cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve must stay within the maximum capability of the unit.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid reactive capability curve data for cim:SynchronousMachine

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: RCCXValues4
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve, each cim:CurveData instance must satisfy the following relation - x*x+y1*y1 LE ratedS*ratedS and x*x+y2*y2 LE ratedS*ratedS where - LE = less or equal - x = cim:CurveData.xvalue - y1 = cim:CurveData.y1value - y2 = cim:CurveData.y2value - ratedS = cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS * (1 + NUMERIC_TOLERANCE)
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: A cim:ReactiveCapabilityCurve must cover the full operating range.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid reactive capability curve data for cim:SynchronousMachine

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: VSCYValues
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:CurveData, for which the cim:CurveData.Curve refers to a cim:VsCapabilityCurve, the cim:CurveData.y2value must be greater than cim:CurveData.y1value
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The name plate ratings are used as a reference
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid cim:VsCapabilityCurve data

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: VSCXValues
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every instance of cim:CurveData, for which the cim:CurveData.Curve refers to a cim:VSCapabilityCurve, at least two instances of the cim:CurveData are associated
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: A curve consists of at least two curve points.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Invalid cim:VSCapabilityCurve data

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: PhaseCodeGround
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Multiple conducting equipment is typically connected to the same cim:TopologicalNode via their cim:Terminals. The phase codes at the cim:Terminals must match the grounding equipment by having phase code N specified. No other phase codes are allowed, e.g. ABC is not allowed. Grounding equipment are - cim:PetersenCoil - cim:Ground - cim:GroundingImpedance Note that cim:GroundDisconnector will have phase code N on the ground side and combination of phases ABC on the equipment side.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Ohms and Kirchoffs laws.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Grounding equipment shall have phase code N only

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: ControlAreaInstance
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Exactly one cim:ControlArea instance with following attributes must be defined: - cim:ControlArea.type is cim:ControlAreaTypeKind.Interchange - an entsoe:IdentifiedObject.energyIdentCodeEic where the third character is 'Y'. The code shall be verified against the enumeration list of ENTSO-E Energy Identification Codes (EIC) availble at the ENTSO-E web site.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The cim:ControlArea of type interchange is the model equivalent of a SchedulingArea.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:ControlArea instance is missing or has erroneous attribute values

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: DCEquipmentContainerMapping
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For each cim:DCConverterUnit and cim:DCLine instance an entsoe:IdentifiedObject.energyIdentCodeEic attribute has been defined, for which the third character is 'T'
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: The mapping of reference schedules for HVDC links is done via the EIC T codes. The EIC T code is also used to identify DC equipment containers that belong to the same HVDC pole.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: EIC T code missing for cim:DCConverterUnit or cim:DCLine

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: RCandTCCcontrollingObjects
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: A cim:RegulatingControl or cim:TapChangerControl shall have at least one controlling object. The cardinality - cim:RegulatingControl[0..1]-[0..*]cim:RegulatingCondEq - cim:TapChangerControl[0..1]-[0..*]cim:TapChanger are currently allowing no controlling objects.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: A cim:RegulatingControl or cim:TapChangerControl without controlling objects cannot perform control. It is important for IGMs quality and CGM creation process to indicate these occurrences.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:RegulatingControl or cim:TapChangerControl without controlling objects

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: SMRatedSunrealistic
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If a cim:SynchronousMachine has a rated power way beyond the specified active and reactive limit values or way outside the reactive capability curve the rated power value is not realistic. A EQ_RATEDS_REASONABILITY_FACTOR (RSRF) is used to determine if a rated power is reasonable. To be realistic and reasonable the cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS shall if an active or reactive power limit is present be less than - max(abs(cim:SynchronousMachine.minQ), abs(cim:SynchronousMachine.maxQ), abs(cim:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP, abs(cim:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP))*RSRF - max(abs(CurveData.xvalue), abs(CurveData.y1value), abs(CurveData.y2value))*RSRF for all x, y1 and y2 values.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Rated powers may be given a large and unrealistic value that will impact other rules which may result in erroneous reporting by them.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Unrealistic cim:RotatingMachine.ratedS specified

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TargetDeadbandOutOfRange
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: If the cim:RegulatingControl.targetDeadband has a value similar to the cim:RegulatingControl.targetValue this means that it has no effect and that the cim:RegulatingControl is in practice disabled. Disabling a cim:RegulatingControl this way shouldn't be used, instead use the cim:RegulatingControl.enabled flag. cim:RegulatingControl.targetDeadband/EQ_DB_REASONABILITY_FACTOR should be less than the cim:RegulatingControl.targetValue. With a value of 2 for the EQ_DB_REASONABILITY_FACTOR this means that if the cim:RegulatingControl.targetDeadband is larger than twice the cim:RegulatingControl.targetValue this means that the target will always stay inside the dead band. The rule is only activated when RegulatingControl.discrete="true".
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Using other ways than cim:RegulatingControl.enabled flag shouldn't be used.
