If no netted area AC or DC positions or netted external schedule can be found for the control area this rule skipped.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: In the Reporting Information Market Document, issued by PEVF or CGMA, the EIC 'Y' code is found in the domain.mRID, in the IGM it is the value of attribute entsoe:IdentifiedObject.EnergyIdentCodeEic for the cim:ControlArea instance.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:ControlArea netInterchange deviates more than INTERCH_IMBALANCE_WARNING MW from netted area position

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: NetInterchangeMatch2
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every cim:ControlArea of type interchange, the value of cim:ControlArea.netInterchange should not deviate more than INTERCH_IMBALANCE_ERROR MW from the sum of the netted area AC and DC positions in the aggregated netted external schedules (PEVF or CGMA) for the same scenarioTime and with the same EIC 'Y' code. If no netted area AC or DC positions or netted external schedule can be found for the control area this rule skipped.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: In the Reporting Information Market Document, issued by PEVF or CGMA, the EIC 'Y' code is found in the domain.mRID, in the IGM it is the value of attribute entsoe:IdentifiedObject.EnergyIdentCodeEic for the cim:ControlArea instance.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:ControlArea netInterchange deviates more than INTERCH_IMBALANCE_ERROR MW from netted area position.

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: InconsistentTnBaseVoltage
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: All equipment with own cim:BaseVoltages connected to a TN shall have a cim:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage that deviates no more than BOUNDARY_BV_MAX_DIFF from the cim:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage of the boundary point.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: If the cim:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage differs this may indicate a topology error.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: cim:BaseVoltages.nominalVoltages at a cim:TopologicalNode differs more than BOUNDARY_BV_MAX_DIFF

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: IGMConvergence
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: This rule appies to IGMs only. It shall be possible to solve the power flow with the following power flow settings: - Full Newton Raphson power flow algorithm. - Switched shunt adjustment must be set to enabled for shunts used for voltage regulation. - Transformer tap adjustment is set to enabled. - Q limits shall be respected for EquivalentInjection, ExternalNetworkInjection, SynchronousMachines, SVCs and SynchronousCondensers (also for slack node/swing bus). - Distributed generation slack is set to enabled (proportional to GeneratingUnit.normalPF). - Maximum mismatch is set to 0.1 MW and 0.1 MVAr per node. - Controlled node voltage error convergence tolerance = 0.0001 pu (The largest difference between actual and scheduled voltage magnitude in per unit at each node where voltage is subject to control to a set point, and for which at least one of the devices participating in the control of bus voltage to its set point is not at a reactive power limit, must be less than the controlled bus voltage error convergence tolerance)
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Power flow could not be calculated for IGM with required settings. Check diagnostic messages

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CGMConvergence
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: This rule applies to CGMs only. It shall be possible to solve the power flow with the following power flow settings: - Full Newton Raphson power flow algorithm. - Switched shunt adjustment must be set to enabled for shunts used for voltage regulation. - Transformer tap adjustment is set to enabled. - Q limits shall be respected for EquivalentInjection, ExternalNetworkInjection, SynchronousMachines, SVCs and SynchronousCondensers (also for slack node/swing bus). - Area interchange control is set to enabled. - Maximum mismatch is set to 0.1 MW and 0.1 MVAr per node. - Controlled node voltage error convergence tolerance = 0.0001 pu (The largest difference between actual and scheduled voltage magnitude in per unit at each node where voltage is subject to control to a set point, and for which at least one of the devices participating in the control of bus voltage to its set point is not at a reactive power limit, must be less than the controlled bus voltage error convergence tolerance)
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Power flow could not be calculated for CGM with required settings. Check diagnostic messages

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TIConvergenceStatMissing
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Convergence status for cim:TopologicalIsland is included in the cim:IdentifiedObject.description of the cim:TopologicalIsland. The values are "diverged" or "converged".
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: It should be possible to conclude if a cim:TopologicalIslands has diverged or converged.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Convergence status missing for cim:TopologicalIsland

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: TIConvergenceStatDiverged
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: Convergence status for cim:TopologicalIsland is diverged. The cim:IdentifiedObject.description of the cim:TopologicalIsland shall then contain the text "diverged".
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: It should be possible to conclude if a cim:TopologicalIslands has diverged or converged.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Convergence status is diverged for cim:TopologicalIsland

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CGMConvergenceRelaxed
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: This rule applies to CGMs only. It shall be possible to solve the power flow with the following power flow settings: - Full Newton Raphson power flow algorithm. - Q limits shall be ignored (also for slack node/swing bus) meaning unlimited reactive resources. - Area interchange control is set to enabled. - Maximum mismatch is set to 0.5 MW and 0.5 MVAr per node. - Controlled node voltage error convergence mismatch = 0.0001 pu (The largest difference between actual and scheduled voltage magnitude in per unit at each node where voltage is subject to control to a setpoint, and for which at least one of the devices participating in the control of bus voltage to its setpoint is not at a reactive power limit, must be less than the controlled bus voltage error convergence mismatch)
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Power flow could not be calculated for CGM with relaxed Q limits. Check diagnostic messages

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CGMVoltageProfile
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: For every energized cim:TopologicalNode, the value of cim:SvVoltage.v should be lower than or equal to the value of cim:VoltageLimit.value associated with cim:OperationalLimitType.limitType=highVoltage and higher than or equal to the value of cim:VoltageLimit.value associated with cim:OperationalLimitType.limitType=lowVoltage
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.justification: Considering the Power Flow settings, all voltage should be within defined operational limits. See IEC TS 61970-600-2:2017 section 6.8.7.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: VoltageLimit violation

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CGMCongestion
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: There should be no base case violations considering PATL limits.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: Base case violation

cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.name: CGMTieFlowImbalance
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.description: The sum of the solved tie flows for each cim:ControlArea of type interchange shall equal the cim:ControlArea.netInterchange plus/minus an INTERCH_IMBALANCE_EMF MW. I.e. o TFS less or equal than cim:ControlArea.netInterchange + INTERCH_IMBALANCE_EMF MW o TFS greater or equal than cim:ControlArea.netInterchange - INTERCH_IMBALANCE_EMF MW Where TFS, the TieFlow sum, is computed as o TFS = sum(cim:SvPowerFlow.p) cim:SvPowerFlow is not available at cim:TieFlow Terminals and must be picked up from the cim:EquivalentInjection Terminal corresponding to the tie flow Terminal.
cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.cgmbp:UMLRestrictionRule.message: The cim:TieFlow sum deviates from the cim:ControlArea interchange more than INTERCH_IMBALANCE_EMF MW
